story_summary: Mitya arrives at the inn and joins Grushenka and others, bringing champagne and attempting to recreate a festive atmosphere. He engages in a heated card game with two Polish men, which ends in accusations of cheating and a physical altercation. After the Poles leave following a confrontation with Grushenka and Mitya, the group locks the door to prevent their return.
evidence_quotes: Mitya rushed up to him, too.
Mitya flew at him at once, clutched him in both hands.
